Arcane Background (Gifted).description: Allows access to supernatural powers with no external trappings

Arcane Background (Magic).description: Allows access to supernatural powers through magical study

Arcane Background (Miracles).description: Allows access to supernatural powers through faith

Arcane Background (Psionics).description: Allows access to supernatural powers through mental discipline

Arcane Background (Weird Science).description: Allows access to supernatural powers through mad science

Aristocrat.description: +2 to Common Knowledge and networking with upper class. Rich lifestyle

Berserk.description: After being Shaken or Wounded, melee attacks +1 Fighting and +1 Strength, but -1 Parry; must make Smarts roll to do anything other than move and attack

Brave.description: +2 to Fear checks and -2 to rolls on the Fear Table

Brawny.description: Treat Strength as one die type higher for Encumbrance and Minimum Strength

Brute.description: Link Athletics to Strength instead of Agility. Short Range of any thrown item increased by +1

Elan.description: +2 when spending a Benny to reroll a Trait roll

Fame.description: +1 Persuasion rolls when recognized, double usual fee for Performance

Famous.description: +2 Persuasion when recognized, 5x or more usual fee for Performance

Fast Healer.description: +2 Vigor when rolling for natural healing; check every 3 days

Fleet-Footed.description: Pace +2, increase running die one step

Linguist.description: Character has d6 in languages equal to half her Smarts die

Luck.description: +1 Benny at the start of each session

Great Luck.description: +2 Bennies at the start of each session

Quick.description: The hero may discard and redraw Action Cards of 5 or lower

Rich.description: Character starts with three times the starting funds and a $150K annual salary

Filthy Rich.description: Character starts with five times the starting funds and a $500K annual salary

Block.description: +1 Parry, ignore 1 point of Gang Up bonus

Improved Block.description: +2 Parry, ignore 2 points of Gang Up bonus

Brawler.description: Toughness +1, add d4 to damage from fists; or increase it a die type if combined with other abilities

Bruiser.description: Increase unarmed Strength damage a die type and declare a free Push

Combat Reflexes.description: +2 Spirit to recover from being Shaken

Counterattack.description: Free attack against one foe per turn who failed a Fighting attack

Improved Counterattack.description: As Counterattack, but against unlimited foes per turn

Dead Shot.requirements: Wild Card, Novice, Athletics or Shooting d8+
Dead Shot.description: First successful Athletics (throwing) or Shooting roll, double damage from Jokers

Dodge.description: -2 to be hit by ranged attacks

Improved Dodge.description: -4 to be hit by ranged attacks

Double Tap.description: +1 to hit and damage when firing no more than RoF 1 per action with semiauto weapons

Extraction.description: One adjacent foe doesn't get a free attack when you withdraw from combat

Improved Extraction.description: Three adjacent foes don't get free attacks when you withdraw from combat

Fast Draw.description: May draw weapon as a free action; +2 to Athletics (throwing) or Shooting if weapon was holstered

First Strike.description: Free Fighting attack once per turn when foe moves within Reach

Improved First Strike.description: Free Fighting attack against unlimited foes when they move within Reach

Free Runner.description: Ignore Difficult Ground and add +2 to Athletics in foot chases and Athletics (climbing)

Frenzy.description: Roll a second Fighting die with one melee attack per turn

Improved Frenzy.description: Roll a second Fighting die with all melee attacks

Giant Killer.description: +1d6 damage vs creatures three Sizes larger or more

Hard to Kill.description: Ignore Wound penalties on Vigor rolls made to avoid Bleeding Out

Harder to Kill.description: Roll a die if the character perishes. On an odd result, he's Incapacitated but stable

Improvisational Fighter.description: Ignore -2 penalty when attacking with improvised weapons

Iron Jaw.description: +2 to Soak and Vigor rolls to avoid Knockout Blows

Killer Instinct.description: Won initiative ties, +2 damage when spending a Benny on a damage roll

Level Headed.description: Draw an additional Action Card each round and choose which one to use

Improved Level Headed.description: Draw two additional Action Cards each round and choose which one to use

Marksman.description: Ignore up to 2 points of penalties from Range, Cover, Called Shot, Size, or Speed; or add +1 to first Shooting roll

Martial Artist.description: Unarmed Fighting +1, fists and feet count as Natural Weapons, add d4 damage die to unarmed Fighting attacks

Martial Warrior.description: Unarmed Fighting +2, increase damage die type

Mighty Blow.description: On first successful Fighting roll each turn, double damage from Jokers

Nerves of Steel.description: Ignore one level of Wound penalties

Improved Nerves of Steel.description: Ignore up to two levels of Wound penalties

No Mercy.description: +2 damage when spending a Benny on a damage roll

Rapid Fire.description: Increase RoF by 1 for one Shooting attack per turn

Improved Rapid Fire.description: Increase RoF by 1 for all Shooting attacks

Rock and Roll!.description: Ignore the Recoil penalty when firing full auto

Steady Hands.description: Ignore Unstable Platform penalty; reduce running penalty to -1

Sweep.description: Fighting attack affects all adjacent foes at -2

Improved Sweep.description: As above, but ignore the -2 penalty

Trademark Weapon.description: +1 Fighting or Shooting with one specific weapon

Improved Trademark Weapon.description: +2 Fighting or Shooting with one specific weapon

Two-Fisted.description: Make one extra Fighting roll with a second melee weapon in the off-hand at no Multi-Action penalty

Two-Gun Kid.description: Make one extra Shooting roll with a second ranged weapon in the off-hand at no Multi-Action penalty

Born a Leader.description: Leadership Edges now apply to Wild Cards

Command.description: +1 to Extras' Shaken or Stunned recovery rolls in Command Range

Fervor.description: Extras in Command Range add +1 to their damage rolls

Hold the Line!.description: +1 to Extras' Toughness in Command Range

Inspire.description: Once per turn, the hero may roll his Battle skill to Support one type of Trait roll, applying it to everyone in Command Range

Natural Leader.description: Leadership Edges apply to all allies in Command Range

Tactician.description: Draw an extra Action Card each turn that may be assigned to any allied Extra in Command Range

Master Tactician.description: Draw and distribute two extra Action Cards instead of one

Extra Effort.requirements: Seasoned, Arcane Background (any), arcane skill d8+
Extra Effort.description: Increase Focus limit by +1 for one power by taking a level of Fatigue

Gadgeteer.requirements: Seasoned, Arcane Background (Weird Science), Weird Science d8+
Gadgeteer.description: Spend 3 Power Points to create a Rank appropriate power for one encounter

Holy/Unholy Warrior.description: Add +1 to damage when fighting supernatural evil (or good)

New Powers.description: Your character knows two new powers

Power Surge.requirements: Wild Card, Seasoned, Arcane Background (any), arcane skill d8+
Power Surge.description: Recover 10 Power Points when dealt a Joker in combat

Rapid Recharge.description: Recover 1 additional Power Point every 30 minutes

Improved Rapid Recharge.description: Recover 1 additional Power Point every 15 minutes

Soul Drain.requirements: Seasoned, Arcane Background (any), arcane skill d10+
Soul Drain.description: Recover 5 Power Points for each enemy Incapacitated in previous round

Wizard.description: Spend 1 extra Power Point to change a spell's Trapping

Ace.description: Character may spend Bennies to Soak damage for his vehicle and ignores up to 2 points of penalties

Acrobat.description: Free reroll on acrobatic Athletics attempts

Combat Acrobat.description: -1 to hit with ranged and melee attacks

Assassin.requirements: Novice, Agility d8+, Fighting d6+, Stealth d8+
Assassin.description: +2 to damage foes when Vulnerable or assassin has The Drop

Investigator.description: +2 to Research and certain types of Notice rolls

Jack-of-all-Trades.description: Gain d4 in a skill (or d6 with a raise) until replaced

McGyver.requirements: Novice, Smarts d6+, Repair d6+, Notice d8+
McGyver.description: Quickly create improvised devices from scraps

Mr. Fix It.description: +2 to Repair rolls, half the time required with a raise

Soldier.description: Strength is one die type higher for Encumbrance and Min Str. +1 to recover from being Shaken

Thief.requirements: Novice, Agility d8+, Stealth d6+, Thievery d6+
Thief.description: +1 to Thievery, Athletics (climbing), and Stealth in urban environments

Woodsman.description: +2 to Survival and Stealth in the wilderness

Bolster.description: Remove Distracted or Vulnerable state after a Test of Wills

Common Bond.description: The hero may freely give her Bennies to any character she can communicate with

Humiliate.description: Free reroll when making Taunt rolls

Provoke.description: May "provoke" foes with a raise on a Taunt roll in combat

Reliable.description: Free reroll when making Support rolls

Retort.description: A raise when resisting a Taunt or Intimidation attack makes the foe Distracted

Streetwise.description: +2 to Common Knowledge and criminal networking

Strong Willed.description: +2 to resist Smarts or Spirit-based Tests of Will

Work the Room.description: Once per turn, roll a second die when Supporting via Performance or Persuasion and apply result to additional ally

Work the Crowd.description: As Work the Room, but up to twice per turn

Beast Bond.description: The hero may spend Bennies for animals under his control

Champion.requirements: Novice, Spirit d8+, Strength d6+, Vigor d6+, Fighting d6+, must be chosen by a deity or other supernatural entity
Champion.description: +2 damage vs. supernaturally evil creatures; +2 to resist fear, Intimidation, and Taunt from such beings

Chi.description: Once per combat, reroll failed attack, make enemy reroll successful attack, or add +d6 to unarmed damage roll

Danger Sense.description: Notice roll at +2 to sense ambushes, assassins, natural hazards, "bad vibes," etc.

Healer.description: +2 to Healing rolls, magical or psychic healing +1

Liquid Courage.description: Alcohol increases Vigor die and reduces Fear penalties

Scavenger.description: May find a needed item once per encounter
